AddDataFormTemplateSpec.Name: Website Child Lock Add Data Form
AddDataFormTemplateSpec.Description: Used to lock a child on the website
AddDataFormTemplateSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda

SaveImplementation.common:CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_DATAFORMTEMPLATE_ADD_WEBSITECHILDLOCK ( @ID uniqueidentifier = null output, @CONTEXTID uniqueidentifier, -- SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILDID @SESSIONID nvarchar(80) = '', @CHANGEAGENTID uniqueidentifier = null ) as
begin set nocount on;
declare @lockTimeout int set @lockTimeout = -10
declare @errorLockPrefix nvarchar(100) set @errorLockPrefix = 'Could not lock child. '
declare @errorLockUnsuccessful nvarchar(100) set @errorLockUnsuccessful = @errorLockPrefix + 'Child is locked by another user.'
declare @errorChildNotEligible nvarchar(100) set @errorChildNotEligible = @errorLockPrefix + 'Child is not eligible.'
declare @errorChildNotReserved nvarchar(100) set @errorChildNotReserved = @errorLockPrefix + 'Child is not reserved.'
declare @sessionIDBlank nvarchar(100) set @sessionIDBlank = @errorLockPrefix + 'Session Cookies must be enabled for this site.'
if @ID is null set @ID = newid()
if @CHANGEAGENTID is null exec dbo.USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT @CHANGEAGENTID output
declare @currentDateTime datetime set @currentDateTime = getdate()
begin try -- Determine if the child is reserved and eligible
declare @sponsorshipOpportunityAvailabilityCode int declare @sponsorshipOpportunityEligibilityCode int
select @sponsorshipOpportunityAvailabilityCode = AVAILABILITYCODE, @sponsorshipOpportunityEligibilityCode = ELIGIBILITYCODE from dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITY where ID = @CONTEXTID
if coalesce (@sponsorshipOpportunityAvailabilityCode, -1) <> 1 begin raiserror (@errorChildNotReserved, 14, 1) return 1 end
if coalesce (@sponsorshipOpportunityEligibilityCode, -1) <> 1 begin raiserror (@errorChildNotEligible, 14, 1) return 1 end
end try begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR return 1 end catch
begin try -- This check is completed after checking availablity / eligibility if coalesce (@SESSIONID, '') = '' begin raiserror (@sessionIDBlank, 14, 1) return 1 end
set NOCOUNT ON; declare @rowsUpdated integer
-- Extend the lock if the sessionid already has a lock on the child. This is especially useful at the end of the checkout process. update dbo.USR_WEBSITE_CHILDLOCK set DATEADDED = @currentDateTime where SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILDID = @CONTEXTID and SESSIONID = @SESSIONID
set @rowsUpdated = @@ROWCOUNT
if @rowsUpdated = 0 begin -- remove old locks for the same child (including this session delete dbo.USR_WEBSITE_CHILDLOCK where SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILDID = @CONTEXTID and DATEADDED < dateadd(minute, @lockTimeout, @currentDateTime)
if not exists (select ID from dbo.USR_WEBSITE_CHILDLOCK where SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILDID = @CONTEXTID and SESSIONID = @SESSIONID) begin -- If the insert is successful, then the lock was acquired insert dbo.USR_WEBSITE_CHILDLOCK (id, SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILDID, SESSIONID, ADDEDBYID, CHANGEDBYID, DATEADDED, DATECHANGED) values (@ID, @CONTEXTID, @SESSIONID, @CHANGEAGENTID, @CHANGEAGENTID, @currentDateTime, @currentDateTime ) end end end try
begin catch if ERROR_NUMBER() = 2627 begin raiserror (@errorLockUnsuccessful, 14, 1) return 1 end else begin exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR return 1 end end catch
return 0
end
